ARABIC: إِنَّا مُنزِلُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَهْلِ هَٰذِهِ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ رِجْزًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْسُقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We will bring down on the inhabitants of this city a devastating punishment from heaven because of their deviance.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have to bring a scourge from the heavens on the people of this city as they are depraved."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We shall bring down upon the people of this city a scourge from the heaven because of their evildoing.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We will bring torment from the sky on this town because of the evil-deeds of its inhabitants".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “We will indeed cause a punishment from the sky to descend upon the inhabitants of this town – the recompense of their disobedience.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, we are about to bring down on the people of this town a great torment from the sky, because they have been rebellious."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We will cause to come down upon the people of this town a punishment from heaven, because they transgressed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We shall send down upon the people of this city wrath out of heaven for their ungodliness.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We are about to bring down upon the folk of this township a fury from the sky because they are evil-livers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We are surely going to bring down a punishment from heaven on the people of this town because of their depravities."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily we are about to bring down upon the inhabitants of this city a scourge from the heaven, for they have been transgressing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We are indeed going to bring down upon the people of this town a punishment from the sky because of the transgressions they used to commit.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For we are going to bring down on the people of this township a Punishment from heaven, because they have been wickedly rebellious."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, we are about to bring down on the people of this town a great torment from the sky, because they have been rebellious (against Allah's Command)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We shall send down anger out of heaven upon the people of this city because they are debauchers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “We will bring down upon the people of this town a scourge from heaven, because of their wickedness.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, we will bring down on the people of this city punishment from the sky because they have been defiantly disobedient."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [29:34] We are indeed going to bring down (read munzilūna or munazzilūna) upon the people of this town a scourge, a chastisement, from the heaven because of, on account of the acts of, their immorality’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 451 (Lo! we are about to bring down upon folk of this township a fury) a torment (from the sky) hurling upon them stones (because they are evil-livers) because they are disbelievers and transgressors.
